name: Sree Sai Enterprise
overview:
Founded in the year 2000, at New Delhi (India), we, “Sree Sai Enterprises”, are engaged in Importing, Trading and Supplying a comprehensive range of DVD Players, Home Theatre Systems, Induction Cookers, Car Speakers, etc. Our exclusive range includes Portable DVD Players, DVD Players, Commercial Induction Cookers, Digital Induction Cookers, Double Burner Induction Cookers, Automatic Induction Cookers, etc.

Warehousing and Packaging: We have a large warehousing facility with smooth inventory management system that is controlled by our warehousing personnel. Our warehousing team is trained in standard warehousing procedure and specific methods to handle unambiguous material. In order to store the products in an organized manner, we have further categorized our warehousing facility in various sections. We deliver our products in high quality packaging material in order to ensure secure shipment at clients’ end.

Our Quality: Our consistent efforts to offer a high quality collection of DVD Players, Home Theater Systems, Induction Cookers, Car Speakers, etc, have given us the popularity of being a prominent company in this domain. The entire range is extensively recognized by our precious clients owing to their features like compact design, durability, optimum performance and longer service life. Furthermore, we have a team of quality controllers, who conduct various tests using modern testing tools to maintain the quality of the offered products. These products are fabricated using premium quality raw material and latest techniques by our vendors. Due to our quality control policy, we have earned the confidence of our valued clients.

Vendor Base: In order to offer optimum quality range to our valuable clients, we are linked with respected vendors of the market. These vendors are selected with the help of our procurement agents, who do in-depth market research to select them. Our vendors are backed with skilled professionals who are always dedicated toward the growth of their company. They assure us that the offered range is made using the best quality raw material and sound techniques in complete conformity with international quality standards. Our vendors assure us that they upgrade all the machinery, installed in their manufacturing base at regular basis in order to maintain the production rate.

Why Us?: Our company is a leading importer and trader of a wide range of DVD Players, Home Theater Systems, Induction Cookers, Car Speakers, etc. The offered range is designed and made in compliance with the set industry norms by our vendors.
